name: T - Carlos Layla
_source: speak;Carlos; Huh? Is this <bconvo>another</> little girl in our ranks?
speak;Layla; Who're you calling little there?!
speak;Layla; I could banish you to a world of complete shadow and darkness!
speak;Carlos; I'm sure you can.{w} Listen, can you hold your own in a fight or not?
speak;Layla; Of course I can, genius!
speak;Carlos;You're a snippy one.{w} How about you take out as many demons as you can,{w} and I'll give you some sweets.{w} Does that sound good?
speak;Layla; Grrr{tgm}...{tgm} I am not just a little girl{tgm}...
